message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  What do you think?
I think we can both do better.  I propose a 51/49 split in my favor.  This way, we both get a slightly larger share than the previous offer.
Let's split it evenly this time.  We've both had our chances to get more, and I think this is the fairest way to end the game.
